DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Acceptability Low-Residue Diet Package ( Enimaclin® ) Diet Control Before Colonoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: In study , investigate randomize , single-blinded , comparative study evaluate efficacy acceptability low-residue diet package ( Enimaclin® ) diet control colonoscopy .
DOC.criteria: Male female Outpatient healthy volunteer health examination , 20~75 year old Eligible oral bowel preparation BMI ( Body Mass Index ) ≤ 30 Patients severe constipation ( few three stool per week ) Patients bowel obstruction Patients contraindicate treatment drug Patients need emergency medication Ineligible bowel preparation Pregnant breastfeeding Patients know allergy treatment drug lowresidue diet package Patients ineligible enroll
